name: Tower Bloxx New York
description:
Get the building fever in the city that never sleeps with Tower Bloxx New York, a sequel to an award-winning brand!

Go to the Big Apple and reach for the sky in this sequel to the wacky skyscraper construction and city building game that will tests your speed, reflexes and puzzle skills! Immerse yourself in a bright and colorful 3D experience while working to create the perfect city in Board Game Mode. Build your city across five distinctive districts and four boards that get progressively more challenging and require a clever strategy. Work cooperatively with others in Co-op Multiplayer Mode or play endlessly in the Quick Game Mode! Don’t just visit the big apple: build it now!

FULL VERSION FEATURES:
• Five game modes with high replay value:
o Quick Game – improved with checkpoints to save your progress
o Board Game – all new city building mode where you draw cards to determine your next move.
o Time Attack - reach the checkpoints before time runs out
o Co-op multiplayer – all new split-screen mode where one person builds and the other straightens up the building
o Challenge – for the advanced players that want to put their skills to the test
• Play with over 8 card types to mix and match, upgrade towers, and more during board game mode
• 5 districts to play across in board game mode: Financial District, Uptown, The Park, Midtown, and Downtown
• Introducing 2 new gameplay elements to Tower Bloxx: Renovation mechanic & Power-up blocks
oRenovation – Straighten up your towers by swiping the blocks horizontally
o4 different power-ups– Life, Combo, Freeze & Happiness. Time the release to get the one you want!
oPower-downs - Be careful when drawing cards, a bad card could slow you down!
•New setting, characters & building types to keep you entertained
•Excellent music and sound effects with the choice to listen to your iPod music selection
